string-array.item: The hymn book does not open
The hymn book was great.Good job!!
Upgrade
This is awesome
T\'s awesome
Amazing
Thanks for the app, but it is a disaster....not working at all.
Awesome
This is the best app. It reminds of my days as a youth . Good app. Keep it up. Works on my tablet flawlessly.
Am using a samsung note 4. The hymn book does not open at all. Am disappointed really. Wasted my bytes downloading the app.
Good
It\'s now awesome. After the recent update. Now enjoying it on my Lolipop
Wonderfull app I\'m loving It
Loved it
Love this app just wish there was a Ndebele version too
E new version is perfect
Love it super
Love this app alot
Good application totally love it!!!!
The best
Just nice
A kiss in the sky love it
Hate this app
I love it
liked it
Loved it
Best hym book ever
makagadzira app yakanaka zvikuru, ndafara nelatest update, tachikumbirawozve mamwe mapages aye emuhymn book eminamato kana zvvichibvira kuti aiswe muApp umu, tatenda
Good work
Maita basa ne update dai zvaigona maita kuti kana Paine ma events tikwanise kutumirwa pa hymn ipapa
Would\'ve given it 5 stars if it doesn\'t constantly crush on my device Great App though, love it
Perfect shona hymn book. why not a ndebele/zulu hymn book?

string-array.name: review_replies
string-array.item: I\'m sure you have Android JellyBean (4.x.x) as your system. This app was made initially targeted at Marshmello (android 5.x.x) and above. We have updated the hymnbook to be compatible (with minor features removed) for it to be compatible but still have a great android experience. Be Blessed.
.Please note the one star defines a lotâ€¦ An improved app rating will motivate updates. Considering a disadvantage to Android 4 users, it would take hard work to match the interface on Android 5+
Update the app, the version available is compatible with all devices now
Glad you liked the update. :) Appreciating the 5 stars.
Can you tell us the reason why you don\'t like it so we can improve on it. Regards Blessing F. Charumbira
Totenda Mwari uye maita basa zvikuru nekutizivisa kuti mafarira this app. Chikumbiro tachinzwa uye tichakuzivisai kana tazvigona in the following updates.
Totenda zvikuru. Tirikutotarisira that feature in the future updates uyezve kuti maevents awa aende kunzvimbo chaidzo.
Thank you for the positive review. Please contact via email with the details of the point of crash and an update will be available soon to patch the error. Best regards. Dev.
